name: Flare-A-Thon
description:
You play as Bonnie. A little fire spirit who lives in the forest. One day, some shady-lookin' sketchy, robed folk rush in and start setting up spooky scarecrows everywhere and terrorizing Bonnie's woodland friends! Bonnie won't have that! She's gotta win the forest back!

This is my entry for the 2018 Butterscotch Shenanijam! The theme I chose was "Burn It Down".
